text: The JAC Heyue A30 is a subcompact Sedan made by JAC Motors from 2012 to 2019. == History and Features == The JAC Heyue A30 was shown at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2012. the car is availiable only as a sedan and has a 1.5 liter petrol engine with a 5-speed both manual and CVT automatic transmissions the final production version was shown at the Shanghai Auto Show in 2013. it was planned to be launched in May. but it was eventually launched in November. == Markets == The JAC Heyue A30 was sold mainly in China but it was sold in Latin America as the JAC J4 and in Iran its sold as the KMC Eagle. == Discontinuation == The JAC Heyue A30 was discontinued in the Chinese market in 2016. it was made outside China until 2019 and is still made until today in Iran. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: JAC Heyue A30
